Macros
DPM External Defintions
DPM API

The section has a list of all external definitions which are exposed by the module. More...

Macros

#define DPM_MAX_FILE_NAME_LEN   32
 This is the maximum length of the file name on assertion.
 
#define DPM_MAX_INFO_SIZE   64
 This is the maximum size of the informational message block which can be passed by the DPC to the application.
 
#define DPM_MAX_BUFFER   3
 This is the common definition for the maximum number of buffers which can be exchanged by the application with the DPC.
 
#define DPM_MAX_DPC_DATA   512U
 This is the maximum size of DPC configuration data which can be transported by the DPM module.
 

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all external definitions which are exposed by the module.
